issues.title: link-types command output format specification missing
issues.description: SKILL.md documents --output accepting 'text' and 'json' formats in Common Options table, but should clarify that link-types only supports text|json (unlike get-dependencies which supports mermaid, dot, plantuml, d2)
issues.impact: Users may try other output formats with link-types that aren't supported
issues.recommendation: Clarify that link-types only supports text|json. Add note in Common Options: 'Note: Not all commands support all formats. See get-dependencies for mermaid/dot/plantuml/d2 support.'

issues.title: clone command missing documented short form for --clone-subtasks
issues.description: Line 147 shows '-l' as short for '--clone-links' correctly, but --clone-subtasks has no short form (-s is used for --summary). Documentation doesn't clarify which options have/don't have short forms.
issues.impact: Users may assume other common flags have short forms when they don't (e.g., trying -c for --clone-subtasks)
issues.recommendation: Update example to show '--clone-subtasks' (no short form). Document in Common Options which clone options have short forms.

issues.title: get-blockers missing --depth 0 behavior documentation
issues.description: Line 159 documents '--depth 3' example but doesn't explain that --depth 0 means unlimited recursion (found in actual CLI help). Users won't know how to get full chain.
issues.documented: jira-as relationships get-blockers PROJ-123 -r --depth 3  # Limit recursion depth
issues.impact: Users won't know how to request full blocker chain and may try negative numbers or not provide a value
issues.recommendation: Add example: 'jira-as relationships get-blockers PROJ-123 -r --depth 0  # Full chain (unlimited)' in Advanced section (line 157)

issues.title: stats command missing --max-results option in documentation
issues.description: Line 173 documents stats examples but omits '-m, --max-results' option which limits total issues analyzed. This is crucial for large projects to avoid timeout/performance issues.
issues.impact: Users analyzing large projects won't know they can limit API analysis scope with --max-results to avoid timeout/performance issues
issues.recommendation: Add example in Advanced section: 'jira-as relationships stats -p PROJ -m 500  # Analyze first 500 issues only'

issues.title: bulk-link command examples missing --output json option
issues.description: Line 176 shows bulk-link examples but doesn't demonstrate '--output json' option which is available (shown in actual CLI). This is useful for parsing results in scripts.
issues.documented_example: jira-as relationships bulk-link --jql "project=PROJ AND fixVersion=1.0" --relates-to PROJ-500 --dry-run
issues.impact: Users won't know they can get structured JSON output from bulk-link operations for scripting
issues.recommendation: Add example: 'jira-as relationships bulk-link --jql "..." --relates-to PROJ-500 --output json' to show structured output capability

issues.title: Quick Start examples missing --clones and --is-blocked-by semantic flags
issues.description: Lines 134-137 show only --blocks, --duplicates, --relates-to examples but actual CLI supports --clones and --is-blocked-by. The --clones flag is documented in body (line 53) but not in examples. --is-blocked-by is the inverse relationship of --blocks.
issues.impact: Moderate - users may not discover --clones flag or may not understand --is-blocked-by as the inverse relationship of --blocks
issues.recommendation: Add examples: 'jira-as relationships link PROJ-1 --is-blocked-by PROJ-2' (to show inverse) and 'jira-as relationships link PROJ-1 --clones PROJ-2' (for template variants)

issues.title: get-dependencies type filtering example uses abbreviated names
issues.description: Line 164 shows: '-t blocks,relates' but actual link types may be capitalized (e.g., 'Blocks', 'Relates'). Example should either use full link type names or advise using 'jira-as relationships link-types' first.
issues.documented_example: jira-as relationships get-dependencies PROJ-123 -t blocks,relates  # -t/--type for filtering
issues.actual_cli: -t, --type TEXT  Comma-separated link types to include
issues.impact: Low - example may fail silently if actual link type names don't match (case-sensitive matching depends on JIRA instance)
issues.recommendation: Change example to: 'jira-as relationships get-dependencies PROJ-123 -t Blocks,Relates' OR add note: 'Use link-types command to discover exact case-sensitive names first' before examples

semantic_flags.--is-blocked-by: present but missing from quick start examples
semantic_flags.--clones: present but missing from quick start examples

positives.comprehensive: All 9 commands are documented and present in CLI
positives.clear_examples: Examples are practical and show common use cases
positives.semantic_flags: Good use of semantic flags (--blocks, --duplicates, etc.) instead of requiring explicit type names
positives.dry_run_support: Consistently documents --dry-run mode for safe testing
positives.graph_formats: Good coverage of visualization formats (mermaid, dot, plantuml, d2)
positives.error_handling: Troubleshooting section is thorough and helpful

priority_1_critical: Add --depth 0 explanation for get-blockers in Advanced section (unlimited recursion)
Document --max-results option for stats command with example
Add --clones and --is-blocked-by examples to link command quick start section
priority_2_important: Clarify in Common Options that link-types only supports text|json (not mermaid/dot like get-dependencies)
Add --output json examples for bulk-link operations
Document exact link type name format for -t/--type filtering (case-sensitive)
priority_3_nice_to_have: Explain that --clone-subtasks has no short form (unlike -p, -s, -l)
Add note about what values --depth accepts (positive integer or 0)

estimated_fix_time: 30 minutes - mostly adding examples and clarifications to existing documentation
